                                         Iterable<SourcePath> inputs)

                                                             ImmutableList<CxxSource> sources)
        Build up the rules to track headers and compile sources for descriptions which handle C/C++ sources and headers.
        Returns:
        a list of SourcePath objects representing the object files from the result of compiling the given C/C++ source.
